titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. William Clemons and Pickney Clemons, Indictment
CWG5297

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: The Grand Jury of Livingston County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Wm Clemons and Pinckney Clemons of the crime of shooting & stabbing James Bozeman with intent to Kill committed as follows. to-wit the said William Clemons and Pinckney Clemons on the 25th day of December 1861. in the County Aforesaid went to the house of James Bozeman and then and there did assault & beat the said Bozeman and then and there did willfully & maliciously shoot and wound said Bozeman and cut and stab him so that of sd wounds inflicted by shooting with a gun and cutting with a Knife both of which were deadly weapons he was in great danger of his life but of sd wounds. he did not die and other great wrongs then and there did assault the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Jno= T= Bunch
atty pro tem court.

James Bozeman
David Elington
Wm Bozeman &
Kelty Bozeman
Not of the Grand Jury.

A Copy Att.
John= W= Webb. D=C.
For James= W= Gade C. L. C. C.
Bail is fixed on this indictment at the sum of $1000, for each of the Defts.

A Copy Att. J= W= Webb. D. C.
prematureLivingston C C. C C-
Comth of Ky
vs }
Wm Clemons & Pinckney
Clemons.A True Bill
W=M= Gray
ForemanFiled & noted March 29th 1862, att. J. W. Cade Clk
B. M. & iisd April 14th, 1862.
att. J. W. Cade ClkA Copy. att.
J. W. Webb D. C.
